      • urlEncode

        public static java.lang.String urlEncode(java.lang.String sStr)
        Return text enconded as an URL. For example, "Tom's Bookmarks" is encodes as "Tom%27s%20Bookmarks"
        Parameters:
        sStr - Text to encode
        Returns:
        URL-encoded text
